New languages:

- Malay

- Turkish

- New vehicle: Fire truck
- Fixed broken fans in the Nuclear Plant
- Minor improvements

NEW VEHICLE
- Community design contest winner Finger Screw is here! Put your skills to the test with this monster of a vehicle!

1.30.2:
- Critical bug fixes
- Critical bug fix

The Garage

Build the vehicle of your dreams. The Garage gives you dozens of new vehicle combinations.
- Collect and upgrade chassis, engines and tires for your vehicle
- Create unique vehicles by mixing chassis, engines and tires
- Balance

1.32.0:
- Boosters! Use boosters to drive some extra meters!
- Corrected issues with new car slots in garage
- Bug fixes and improvements

- New vehicle: Trophy Truck
- New stage: Arena
- Bug fixes and improvements

1.34.0
- Daily Challenges
- Bug fixes

1.34.1
- Daily Challenges
- Fixed level profile issues with seasons, bootcamp, ragnarok and arena

- Daily Challenges! Every day there is a new challenge to conquer!
- Fixed issues in the rainbow stage
- Bug fixes

1.35.0
- Chopper bike is here! Have a smooth ride with this ultra cool custom Chopper!

- New special events

- Various bug fixes

- New Vehicle: Lowrider
Hill climb in style and rule the streets with this hip hopper! Dont forget to check out the sweet hydraulics on this bad boy!
